description.english: Now claim the power of darkness...
With the power of the kurath...
Now, should you give it away?
Become reborn in the glory of the shattering...
Try to enhance it with magic...
Enter the village for the first time from the east ...
Return a weapon to its former glory…
May the power of the moon be with you...
Your mask is not for collection...
Its the end of your madness...
The realm fractures further, but you remain...
Bring Estern all of the scrolls
Have Namir help in the final battle
Reveal to Belicor the true fate of his father...
Destroy a dummy in the Namless Village
Once a mighty forest... now this
So this is where the Royal Forest went...
Read all the notes in the Workshop...
Die from the effects of the curse
Have 3 negative status effects at once
Defeat a boss with less than 5% health
Earn 1000 gold from feeding the dwarf...
Feed the dwarf the Maiden's Greataxe...
Discover the final resting place of a long forgotten lord...
Prevent Garret from killing anyone in the Namless Village
Talk with Warka after defeating the Collector
Spend some time with the Restless...

displayName.english: You May Just Survive After All

description.english: Report to Argon about Ovarius's vanquishment
Achieve true friendship with the merchant. 3000 gold only!
Bring cheese to the rat monarchs
Reveal hidden lantern with Eye of Secret
